plot: The Bob father invites two other crime families to his big Thanksgiving Dinner. Unfortunately they are mortal enemies so it is up to Left Finger Louie and Knuckles to keep the two warring families from seeing each other.
title: "The Bob Show" Mafioso: The Italian Thanksgiving
